name: Пацанский цитатник / Russian Test
description:
Russian Test is simple test about some specific Russian culture in some places.

There are 3 types of test

First one is test for true russian boys from criminal areas.

Second one is test about specific prison riddle

Third one is mixed test ( you need complete sentence or answer for questions about political, memes and so on..)

Some features

-3 types of test
- Pictures can help you
- Nice music


Try to know something new about specific Russian culture
